amendment.description: Amendment sought to phase out the peanut support program over a period of seven years and repeal the quota system by 2002.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to phase out the peanut support program over a period of seven years, and to repeal the quota system by the year 2002.

action.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 212 (Roll No. 34).
